title: Resolve the Abduction
content:
duct Isobel. We decided to help Isobel fight him off. We refused to help Marcus abduct Isobel, and instead helped her fight him off. We attacked Marcus after he told us about his plan to abduct Isobel. We warned Jaheira about Marcus' plan to abduct Isobel. We should help her terminate Marcus before he can carry out his plan.

Report to Z'rell.

We helped Marcus abduct Isobel, and she was carried off to Moonrise Towers. Z'rell will be pleased.

Report to Ketheric.

We helped Marcus abduct Isobel,
